content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Area (x=1-5, y=1-3.5)
Consists of:
- Two furnaces at (1,1) and (3,1)
- Two burner inserters at (1.5,2.5) and (3.5,2.5)
- Two output chests at (1.5,3.5) and (3.5,3.5) containing iron plates
- Additional burner inserter and chest setup at (5.5,2.5) and (5.5,3.5)

### Copper Plate Production Area (x=2-4.5, y=7-9.5)
Consists of:
- Two furnaces at (2,7) and (4,7)
- Three burner inserters at (2.5,8.5), (3.5,9.5), and (4.5,8.5)
- Two output chests at (2.5,9.5) and (4.5,9.5)
- Connected by transport belts

### Copper Cable Assembly Line (x=14.5, y=11.5-14.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest at (14.5,11.5)
- Assembling machine at (14.5,14.5)
- Burner inserter at (14.5,12.5)
- Output system with chest at (11.5,14.5)
- Multiple burner inserters and transport belts for material movement

### Electronic Circuit Assembly Line (x=21.5, y=11.5-15.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest at (21.5,11.5)
- Assembling machine at (21.5,15.5)
- Multiple burner inserters and chests for component handling
- Output chest at (24.5,15.5)

### Power Generation System (x=-5.5 to 13.5, y=26.5-40.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (2.5,35.5)
- Boiler at (7.0,35.5)
- Steam engine at (13.5,35.5)
- Extensive pipe network for water and steam
- Connected to electrical network through poles

ERROR TIPS

### Transport Belt Placement Errors
- Ensure you have transport belts in inventory before attempting to connect entities
- Plan belt layouts to have sufficient items for the entire connection path

### Resource Management Issues
- Monitor fuel levels in burner inserters, particularly at (19.5,15.5) which is running low on coal
- Ensure consistent material supply to assembly machines to prevent production stoppages

### Production Flow Issues
- Assembly machines showing ingredient shortages - ensure proper supply chain of materials
- Monitor and maintain proper input/output balance in production lines

### Power System Management
- Keep boiler fueled to maintain consistent power generation
- Ensure proper fluid connections between power system components
